home.slider1: TNU PROFESSORS WON 3 MEDALS AT THE MIDDLE EAST INVENTORS FORUM
home.title_news: GRAND CELEBRATION OF THE ARMED FORCES DAY AT TNU
home.text_news: Today (21.02.2025), a scientific and cultural event was held at the Tajik National University in honor of the 32nd anniversary of the establishment of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Tajikistan.

footer.desc: Tajik National University is the first and one of the largest universities in Tajikistan, and a major center for culture, education, and science. Founded in 1948, it is located in the capital city, Dushanbe. The rector is Professor Nasriddinzoda E. S.
